called.from sentence: In this paper, we propose an accelerated robust subset selection method to highly raise the speed on the one hand, and to boost the robustness on the other.

use.from sentence: To this end, we use the lp(0<p<=1)-norm based robust measure for the representation loss, preventing large errors from dominating our objective.

speedup solver.based on: data size is generally much larger than feature length

propose.from sentence: Then, based on the observation that data size is generally much larger than feature length, i.e. N >> L, we propose a speedup solver. The main acceleration is owing to the Augmented Lagrange Multiplier (ALM) and an equivalent derivation.
